query: SELECT supdist, facility_type, date_trunc_ym(created_date) AS month, COUNT(*) AS count WHERE created_date >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY supdist, facility_type, month ORDER BY month, supdist, facility_type

column_metadata.description: Supervisor district where the facility is located
Date when the facility entry was created

table_metadata.title: Recreation and Parks Facilities
table_metadata.description: Facilities maintained by the Recreation and Parks Department. A facility in this dataset represents a structural or physical amenity within a property's boundaries.
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: City planners, community groups, policy makers
